name: FLAME ON, SPARKY!
description:
Once upon a time, in a vast forest, there was an empty campfire. Suddenly, from within the campfire, a flame burst forth. The flame was small and weak, but it burned with a fierce determination. It knew that it had a special mission to fulfill. The flame was called Sparky, and its task was to find and bring back all the missing flames that had disappeared from the bonfire. 

~ The game was made for XGJ 2023 ~
